screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .vibr file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.62
screenshot.caption: VIBR file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.62

description: You can create and play VIBR files with various programs on desktop and mobile devices and on the web. For example, VibRat is a web application that allows you to create custom vibration sequences and download them as VIBR files.
After creating a VIBR file, you can open it with software that supports the format. When played, the device's vibrator motor plays back the custom sequence.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .vibr file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.62
images.caption: VIBR file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.62
